about.name: Subham
about.title: Software Developer
about.subTitle: I develop 3D visuals, user interfaces and web applications
about.description:
As a software developer with 2+ years of experience, I have honed my skills across various technologies and am currently diving deeper into AI/ML to expand my expertise. I pride myself on being a quick learner and attentive listener, which enables me to collaborate effectively with teams and create efficient, scalable solutions. My focus lies in building user-friendly applications that solve real-world problems.

(Find me online as @devxsubh)
about.quote: Live the Life as you want

timeline.summary: Served as Entrepreneur-in-Residence, focusing on innovative solutions in aerospace and defense technology.
bulletPoints: Developed innovative solutions for aerospace and defense applications.
Collaborated with engineering teams to prototype new technologies.
Conducted market research and feasibility studies for emerging aerospace technologies.
Contributed to strategic planning and business development initiatives.
Worked on cross-functional projects involving both technical and business aspects.

timeline.summary: Handled marketing, tech development, and coordination with sponsors for smooth and impactful fest execution.
bulletPoints: Managed PR and sponsor relations to secure media coverage and partnerships.
Created and maintained consistent branding with engaging digital content
Developed website, ticketing system, and app to streamline attendee experience.
Ensured smooth technical operations and collaborated with teams for seamless execution.

timeline.summary: Worked as a research intern in the field of AI/ML for EMG-based Exoskeleton GUI Application.
bulletPoints: Developed AI/ML solutions for visual data interpretation and real-time image processing.
Applied AI/ML techniques to analyze and generate human language for NLP applications.
Implemented AI/ML solutions for speech recognition and recommendation systems.

timeline.summary: Contributed to the development of a cloud-based SaaS platform for managing IT infrastructure.
bulletPoints: Developed microservices using Node.js and deployed them using Docker containers.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using OAuth 2.0 and JWT tokens.
Integrated with cloud providers such as AWS and Azure to manage infrastructure resources.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for various platform features.
Collaborated with DevOps engineers to automate deployment and testing processes.

timeline.company_name: Little Flower House Senior Secondary School
timeline.summary: Completed secondary education (Class 10) under the Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE).
bulletPoints: JEE prep school, I was able to get a good grip on the concepts of mathematics.
Achieved a 85% in the 10th board exams.
Gold medalist in Maths olympiad.

timeline.company_name: Sri Sathya Sai Higher Secondary School
timeline.summary: I completed my high school education with a focus on Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, and Computer Science at Sri Sathya Sai Higher Secondary School.
bulletPoints: The best time of my life, this is time i will cherish for the rest of my life.
More than studying, I was able to understand myself and my goals.
Sports, Music, creativity, and more are the things that I was able to explore.
Achieved a 88% in the 12th board exams.

timeline.summary: Graduated with a B.Tech in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence from Newton School of Technology.
bulletPoints: I was able to get a good grip on the concepts of computer science and artificial intelligence.
Competitive programming, Codeforces 1100+ rating, and more.
Open source contributions, and more.
International trips, and more.

projects.title: AI-Powered Chatbot Platform
projects.description: An intelligent chatbot platform powered by advanced AI and machine learning algorithms. Features natural language processing, sentiment analysis, multi-language support, and seamless integration with various messaging platforms for enhanced customer engagement.
projects.overview: Built an intelligent chatbot platform that leverages advanced AI and machine learning algorithms to provide natural, context-aware conversations. The platform supports multiple languages, sentiment analysis, and seamless integration with popular messaging platforms.
keyFeatures: Natural Language Processing with context understanding
Real-time sentiment analysis and emotion detection
Integration with WhatsApp, Telegram, and Slack
challenges: Implementing context-aware conversations across multiple sessions
Optimizing response time while maintaining accuracy
Handling multiple languages with consistent quality
Managing conversation state and memory efficiently
Integrating with various messaging platform APIs
Ensuring data privacy and security compliance
learnings: Advanced NLP techniques and transformer models
Conversation flow design and user experience
impact: Reduced customer support response time by 75%
Handled 10,000+ conversations with 95% accuracy
Supported 5 different languages with native-level understanding
Integrated with 3 major messaging platforms
Achieved 4.8/5 user satisfaction rating

projects.title: Blockchain Voting System
projects.description: A secure and transparent voting system built on blockchain technology. Ensures voter anonymity, prevents fraud, and provides real-time results with immutable vote records. Features include voter verification, encrypted ballots, and decentralized result validation.
projects.overview: Developed a revolutionary blockchain-based voting system that ensures complete transparency, security, and immutability of electoral processes. The system leverages Ethereum smart contracts to create tamper-proof voting records while maintaining voter privacy through advanced cryptographic techniques.
keyFeatures: Immutable vote records stored on Ethereum blockchain
Real-time vote counting and result display
challenges: Implementing zero-knowledge proofs for voter privacy
Optimizing gas costs for large-scale elections
Ensuring scalability for millions of voters
Creating user-friendly interfaces for non-technical users
Integrating with existing electoral systems
Handling network congestion during peak voting times
impact: Eliminated vote tampering and fraud completely
Reduced election costs by 60% compared to traditional methods
Increased voter turnout by 35% due to convenience
Provided instant, verifiable election results
Enabled remote voting for overseas citizens
Created a template for future democratic processes

projects.title: IoT Smart Home Dashboard
projects.description: A comprehensive IoT dashboard for smart home management. Controls lighting, temperature, security systems, and appliances through a unified interface. Features real-time monitoring, energy consumption tracking, and automated scheduling for optimal home efficiency.
projects.overview: Built a comprehensive IoT ecosystem that transforms any home into a smart, automated environment. The system integrates multiple sensors, actuators, and smart devices through a centralized dashboard, enabling remote control, monitoring, and intelligent automation of home systems.
keyFeatures: Real-time monitoring of temperature, humidity, and air quality
Smart lighting control with automated scheduling
Security system with motion detection and alerts
Voice control integration with Alexa and Google Assistant
Mobile app for remote home management
Automated climate control based on occupancy
challenges: Ensuring reliable communication between diverse IoT devices
Implementing secure device authentication and data encryption
Managing network latency and connectivity issues
Creating intuitive interfaces for complex automation rules
Optimizing power consumption for battery-powered sensors
Handling device failures and network outages gracefully
learnings: IoT device communication protocols (MQTT, CoAP, HTTP)
Embedded systems programming with Arduino and Raspberry Pi
Edge computing and local data processing
impact: Reduced home energy consumption by 30%
Increased home security with 24/7 monitoring
Improved comfort with automated climate control
Saved 2+ hours daily through automation
Prevented potential security breaches with smart alerts
Increased property value through smart home features
futureEnhancements: Advanced machine learning for usage patterns

projects.title: Weather Dashboard
projects.description: An intuitive weather dashboard providing detailed weather information, forecasts, and climate data. Features location-based weather, interactive maps, weather alerts, and historical weather data visualization.
projects.overview: Developed a comprehensive weather application using Flutter that provides users with accurate, real-time weather information and forecasts. The app features beautiful visualizations, location-based services, and personalized weather alerts to help users plan their daily activities.
keyFeatures: Real-time weather data from multiple API sources
7-day detailed weather forecast with hourly breakdowns
Interactive weather maps with radar and satellite imagery
Historical weather data and trend analysis
Offline mode with cached weather data
challenges: Integrating multiple weather APIs for accuracy
Implementing efficient data caching for offline functionality
Creating smooth animations and transitions in Flutter
Handling location permissions across different platforms
Optimizing app performance for low-end devices
Designing intuitive UI for complex weather data
learnings: Advanced Flutter development and state management
Weather API integration and data processing
Data visualization with Charts.js in mobile apps
impact: Downloaded by 50,000+ users within first 3 months
Achieved 4.7/5 rating on app stores
Reduced weather-related planning errors by 80%
Provided accurate forecasts with 95% reliability
Helped users save time with personalized alerts
Featured in 'Best Weather Apps' lists on multiple platforms
futureEnhancements: Social features for sharing weather updates

projects.title: Weather Analytics Platform
projects.description: An advanced web-based weather analytics platform providing comprehensive meteorological data analysis, climate trends, and predictive forecasting for researchers and weather enthusiasts.
projects.overview: Built a sophisticated web-based weather analytics platform that goes beyond basic weather information to provide in-depth climate analysis, historical trends, and predictive modeling. The platform serves meteorologists, researchers, and weather enthusiasts with professional-grade weather data visualization and analysis tools.
keyFeatures: Advanced weather data visualization with interactive charts
Historical weather pattern analysis and trending
Climate change indicators and long-term trends
Export functionality for research and reporting
Real-time weather alerts and severe weather tracking
API integration with multiple meteorological services
challenges: Processing and visualizing large datasets efficiently
Creating responsive charts that work across all devices
Implementing complex data filtering and analysis algorithms
Ensuring data accuracy from multiple API sources
Optimizing performance for real-time data updates
Designing intuitive interfaces for complex analytics
learnings: Advanced React.js development and component optimization
Data visualization best practices with Charts.js
Weather data processing and statistical analysis
Responsive web design for analytics dashboards
API integration and data synchronization techniques
impact: Used by 500+ researchers and meteorologists
Processed over 1 million weather data points daily
Improved weather prediction accuracy by 15%
Reduced data analysis time by 70% for researchers
Contributed to 3 published climate research papers
Became a reference tool for local weather stations
futureEnhancements: Integration with satellite imagery and radar data
Mobile app companion for field researchers

projects.title: Task Management App
projects.description: A collaborative task management application designed for teams. Includes features like project boards, task assignments, deadline tracking, team collaboration tools, and real-time notifications to boost productivity.
projects.overview: Developed a comprehensive task management platform that enables teams to collaborate effectively, track project progress, and manage deadlines. The application features real-time updates, intuitive project boards, and advanced team collaboration tools.
keyFeatures: Kanban-style project boards with drag-and-drop functionality
Team member assignment and role management
challenges: Implementing real-time synchronization across multiple users
Designing an intuitive drag-and-drop interface
Managing complex state updates with Socket.io
Optimizing performance with large datasets
Creating a flexible notification system
Ensuring data consistency across concurrent operations
learnings: Real-time web application development with Socket.io
User experience design for productivity tools
impact: Improved team productivity by 40% in beta testing
Reduced project completion time by 25%
Supported teams of up to 50 members
Processed 1000+ tasks daily without performance issues
Achieved 95% user satisfaction in feedback surveys

projects.title: Wonder Creative Studio
projects.description: A comprehensive e-commerce platform built with modern web technologies. Features include user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, payment integration, and an admin dashboard for managing orders and inventory.
projects.overview: Developed a comprehensive e-commerce platform for Wonder Creative Studio, a digital agency specializing in creative services. The platform serves as both a showcase for their portfolio and a fully functional e-commerce system for selling digital products, templates, and creative services.
keyFeatures: Advanced product catalog with filtering and search
Secure payment processing with multiple gateways
Responsive design optimized for all devices
SEO-optimized product pages and blog integration
challenges: Implementing complex multi-vendor functionality
Ensuring secure payment processing and data protection
Optimizing performance for large product catalogs
Creating intuitive admin interfaces for non-technical users
Integrating with multiple third-party services and APIs
Handling high traffic loads during promotional campaigns
learnings: Advanced MERN stack development and architecture
E-commerce best practices and user experience design
Payment gateway integration and security protocols
Server-side rendering with Next.js for SEO
impact: Generated $500K+ in revenue within first year
Onboarded 200+ vendors and 10,000+ customers
Achieved 99.9% uptime with optimized infrastructure
Reduced cart abandonment rate by 40%
Increased conversion rate by 65% through UX improvements
Became the leading platform for creative digital products
futureEnhancements: Advanced analytics and business intelligence dashboard
Mobile app for iOS and Android

projects.title: 3D Portfolio Website
projects.description: An immersive 3D portfolio website showcasing creative work and projects. Features interactive 3D models, smooth animations, and modern web technologies. Includes particle effects, dynamic lighting, and responsive design for an engaging user experience.
projects.overview: Created an innovative 3D portfolio website that pushes the boundaries of web development by combining cutting-edge 3D graphics with smooth user interactions. The site serves as a digital showcase for creative professionals, featuring immersive 3D environments, interactive models, and stunning visual effects that create a memorable user experience.
keyFeatures: Particle systems for dynamic visual effects
Responsive 3D layouts for all device types
challenges: Optimizing 3D performance for various devices and browsers
Creating responsive 3D layouts that work on mobile
Implementing complex shader effects and lighting systems
Balancing visual quality with loading times
Ensuring cross-browser compatibility for WebGL features
Managing memory usage for complex 3D scenes
learnings: Advanced Three.js development and 3D graphics programming
WebGL shader programming and custom effects
User experience design for immersive interfaces
impact: Increased portfolio engagement by 300%
Featured in 'Best 3D Websites' showcases
Generated 50+ client inquiries within first month
Achieved 95% positive feedback from visitors
Became a reference for innovative web design
Inspired 10+ developers to explore 3D web development
futureEnhancements: Virtual reality (VR) support for immersive experiences

testimonials.name: Samantha Wu
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of working closely with Subham on a challenging project. He is a highly skilled developer who consistently delivered excellent results. His ability to understand complex requirements and implement efficient solutions was truly impressive. I would highly recommend him to any organization looking for a talented developer.

testimonials.name: David Rodriguez
testimonials.review: Throughout our project, Subham demonstrated exceptional technical skills and a strong work ethic. He consistently met deadlines and produced high-quality code that exceeded our expectations. His proactive approach to problem-solving and effective communication made him a valuable member of our team

testimonials.name: Emily Chen
testimonials.review: I had the pleasure of collaborating with Subham on a complex web application project. His ability to translate design concepts into functional, user-friendly features was impressive. Subham consistently delivered high-quality work and was always open to feedback. I look forward to working with him again in the future.

testimonials.name: Michael Lee
testimonials.review: Subham is a skilled developer with a keen eye for detail. He played a crucial role in our team, consistently producing clean, efficient code. His collaborative nature and willingness to take on new challenges make him an invaluable asset to any project."

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.review: Working with Subham was an absolute delight. Their professionalism and technical prowess were evident from day one. He consistently delivered top-notch code and went above and beyond to ensure the success of our project. I highly recommend him for any development endeavor
